Dark One/Breakdown/Hiss/Pyro/Scavenger/Ramhorn/Stinkbomb/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Injector/Manterror:



::Breakdown looked to Hiss and Pyro::
"I do not know where we were to escort you.  This Transantulas character only 
told us your coordinates and what we were to do."

::Hiss activates his internal com and whispers so only he can here it::
<Dark One, this is Hiss, things are slowly going wrong.  We request 
Scavenger's and your presence here now>

::Pyro looked around to the diagnostic drone::
"That's your leader?  Hiding in a shell...interesting.  Many civilizations 
have done that.  It's relatively stupid.  You can easily be killed, you know. 
 If we were to go into battle with attacking forces.  If you can, I suggest 
going into a more armored body." (Pyro said, giving his opinion)

==========

::Ramhorn stepped out of the CR chamber he had been put in by Antagony and 
her friend, shaking his head::
"Ow...that was a bad beating..." (Ramhorn headed for his quarters, a little 
dizzy)

::Stinkbomb's cr chamber's door went open, several minutes Stinkbomb 
collapsed out of it, getting up quickly and looking around paranoid-like::
(Their all out to get me, all out to get me...) he thought to himself, very 
paranoid, jogging towards his quarters.


=============

::Manterror and Injector walked into the Predacon base, Manterror collapsing::

<Hell Beast, send down some help.  Manterror and I are badly hurt.> (Injector 
collapsed as well, though he didn't pass out like Manterror did)

---------------------------

::Dark One recieved Hiss' message, and nodded to Scavenger, who had heard it 
too::
<Zardus, this is Dark One, I will return shortly>
::Dark One and Scavenger transformed to beast mode, heading for Breakdown and 
co's position::
